data.blankContent: Sam's son Ben takes a bath every night. He ____ lots ____ soap ____ shampoo, and ____ with ____ toys. Sometimes ____ soap ____ water ____ on ____ bathroom ____. When he's done, his mom dries his hair with a big soft towel.
data.partBlankContent: Sam's son Ben takes a bath every night. He us__ lots o_ soap a__ shampoo, and pl___ with ba__ toys. Sometimes t__ soap a__ water ge__ on t__ bathroom fl___. When he's done, his mom dries his hair with a big soft towel.
data.answer: 萨姆的儿子本每天晚上都洗澡。他使用大量的肥皂和洗发水，玩婴儿玩具。有时肥皂和水会弄到浴室的地板上。当他做完后，他的妈妈用一条柔软的大毛巾擦干他的头发。
